divs: Sighting DetailsTwo orange orbs flew low over North Miami. The witness and a friend were outside and saw the orbs. When an airplane came close, the orbs dimmed and faded out, but reappeared again when the airplane left the area. MM Zimmer
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around October 11th 2008
